sourcesContent:
<script setup>

import {onBeforeMount } from 'vue'
import { useStore } from 'vuex'


const store = useStore()

const showShipsList=()=>{
  store.dispatch("getShipList")
}
onBeforeMount(()=>{
  if (store.state.pageShip==1){
    showShipsList();
  }
})
</script>
<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link :to="{name:'home'}">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name:'naves'}">Naves</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name:'actors'}">Actores</router-link>
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav {
  padding: 30px;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
